case_title: ANWAR SAIFULLAH KHAN vs Haji MUHAMMAD KABIR KHAN

issue_6.description: No polling held at female booth of Polling Station No. 101 due to absence of female polling staff.

issue_7.description: Polling at female booth of Polling Station No. 102 started late, denying voters their right to vote.

issue_8_to_12.description: Various allegations of disenfranchisement due to postal ballot issues and refusal of ballot papers.

issue_14.description: Polling resumed after official close at Polling Station No. 55.

issue_21_and_22.description: Tampering with election material during unauthorized withdrawal from treasury.

issue_1.description: Non-verification of petition and annexures as per Order VI, Rule 15 of CPC.

issue_3.description: Non-impleadment of election officials as respondents.

issue_25.description: Relief sought for declaring election void due to material impact on results.

polling_station_102.disenfranchised_voters: Substantial number due to late start of polling.

key_findings.material_impact: Disenfranchisement at Polling Stations No. 101 and 102 materially affected election results.

relief_granted.action: Election declared void under Section 70(a) of the Representation of the People Act, 1976.
relief_granted.recommendation: Fresh election to be held in Constituency NA-20 Lakki Marwat, Bannu.
